title: Content SEO Writer
overview: A Content SEO Writer at Educative writes, edits, and publishes informative, engaging content for a technical audience, and applies SEO best practices to optimize content for search engine rankings.
description:

extras.title: About the Role

extras.title: Qualifications

A writing-intensive academic background (e.g. B.A. in English or Journalism).
Exceptional long-form writing and research skills (and samples to prove it)Ability to communicate complex, technical ideas in accessible, digestible ways.
